Address.label: Address
Address.value: STONEMASON'S WAY,RATHFARNHAM, DUBLIN, D16 KH51, Ireland

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: CRH is a global manufacturer of a range of building products used in construction projects, operating via a vertically integrated business model. The past decade has seen CRH transform into a leading building materials business, with increasing exposure to upstream building activities such as aggregates and cement. CRH's geographic footprint is mostly across developed markets. North America is CRH's largest market and accounts for 59% of sales.

value.name: Albert Jude Manifold
value.title: Group Chief Executive Officer & Executive Director
